plugin.name: Cordova FCM
plugin.description: Share text, images (and other files), or a link via the native sharing widget of your device. Android is fully supported, as well as iOS 6 and up. WP8 has somewhat limited support.
plugin.author: Eddy Verbruggen
plugin.keywords: Social, Share, Twitter, Facebook, Email, SMS, WhatsApp, Tumblr, Pocket, LinkedIn
